DistanceEstimateInMeter(Single, Single, Single, Single)

Returns an estimate of the distance between the two given coordinates. Stolen from https://github.com/itinero/routing/blob/1764afc75db43a1459789592de175283f642123f/src/Itinero/LocalGeo/Coordinate.cs
